SummaryEnglish: Barbie's Dreamworld is a CGI-animated YouTube series animated by Relish Studios. It began in 2021 and follows Barbie "Malibu" Roberts, her family and her friends as they go on adventures. The themes of the series are fashion, music, friendship and fun. The series is composed of several different miniseries.

1.SummaryEnglish: Barbie, Ken and their friends enter a virtual DIY accessory competition with a rainbow statement necklace. The first place winner gets to go to a SUPER cool, VIP Secret Fashion show. Will they win?.

2.SummaryEnglish: Barbie and her friends make it to the VIP fashion show - or have they? It doesn't really look like a runway...YET.

3.TitleEnglish: Barbie's party fashion show live stream!
3.SummaryEnglish: Barbie and her friends figure out how to work the MAGICAL runway at the secret VIP fashion show - they're the models AND the designers. Time to WORK IT. Barbie live streams the show so she and her friends can inspire viewers around the world - it's FASHION FUN FOR EVERYONE.

1.SummaryEnglish: Barbie, Skipper, Stacie and Chelsea team up to form the Malibu Helpers' Club. Their first project? Transforming an abandoned lot into a community garden.

2.SummaryEnglish: Barbie decides to foster a puppy and surprise her sisters at the same time for the Malibu Helper's Club. Turns out...her sisters had the same idea, too. With four adorable puppies in need of a home, Barbie and her sisters decide to throw the pups a puppy party and put it on the vlog in hopes they'll attract the puppies their pur-fect fur-ever homes.

3.SummaryEnglish: It's a rare rainy day in Malibu. Barbie, Skipper, Stacie and Chelsea are inside playing a board game when their neighbor drops by with her little sister and a big babysitting ask. As the founding members of the Malibu Helpers' Club, Barbie steps up and they agree to babysit. But will the tiny tot have fun?.

4.TitleEnglish: Best Day Ever at Jungle Park
4.SummaryEnglish: Chelsea can't wait to go to the local water park, and Barbie surprises her with an even better idea - a day at a jungle eco-park. The girls hop in the DreamPlane and spend the BEST DAY EVER at a jungle eco-park.

1.TitleEnglish: Barbie Meets Mermaids and the Rainbow Queen in Dreamtopia
1.SummaryEnglish: Barbie and Chelsea travel in the Magical DreamCamper to DREAMTOPIA. There, they meet the Rainbow Queen who has lost her magical wand. Without the wand, the grand parade of light will be canceled.

2.TitleEnglish: Barbie Falls in Rainbow Gems in the Musical Forest
2.SummaryEnglish: Barbie and Chelsea help the Rainbow Queen prepare for the grand parade of light. First up? Making sure the musical forest is in tune. But the musicians are out of whack. And Barbie accidentally falls into a magical pit of rainbow gems. Will Chelsea be able to save her?

3.TitleEnglish: Barbie & Chelsea Ride Unicorns and Rainbow Rollercoasters
3.SummaryEnglish: Barbie and Chelsea get swept up into the clouds on a beautiful rainbow rollercoaster. When it looks like they might be flying off the edge, the Dreamtopia unicorns swoop in and save the day. To thank the unicorns, Barbie and Chelsea help a mama unicorn find her missing baby unicorn. They visit the Grand Rainbow Arch and meet a new princess friend, too.

4.TitleEnglish: Barbie Dances with Rainbow Light Mermaids
4.SummaryEnglish: While continuing to search for the Rainbow Queen's missing magical wand, a merman prince invites Barbie and Chelsea underwater to meet the mermaids. With the help of Honey, Barbie and Chelsea find the Queen's wand.

5.TitleEnglish: Barbie and Chelsea Find the Queen's Magical Wand
5.SummaryEnglish: Barbie and Chelsea finally find the Rainbow Queen's missing magical wand. But now, they need to find the Rainbow Queen herself. Little do they know, the Rainbow Queen took the Magical Dreamcamper all the way to Malibu. There, she meets Ken, Skipper and Stacie. Together, the four of them travel back to Dreamtopia to find Barbie and Chelsea.

6.TitleEnglish: Princess Dance Party with Unicorns & Mermaids
6.SummaryEnglish: With the magical wand found and Barbie's friends and family in Dreamtopia, it's now time for the Grand Parade of Light. The unicorns go first, dazzling the crowd with a beautiful prance. Next, the mermaids do their water dance, and finally, it's time for the princesses to sing their duet. But are they ready?.

1.TitleEnglish: Barbie's Smoothie Shop in the Mall
1.SummaryEnglish: Barbie has a new job in the mall, making delicious smoothies at the Smoothie Shop. After a long but fun day at work, she heads over to the restaurant to meet up with her friends. They discuss their new summer jobs and their weekend plans--Barbie is competing in the Ride 'N Style competition and she needs their help to get ready.

2.TitleEnglish: Barbie Falls During Horse Show Practice
2.SummaryEnglish: Oh no, Barbie falls while practicing for the Ride 'N Style competition. Her friends take her to the clinic to get her leg checked out. The doctor tells Barbie she can't compete. Barbie asks her friend, Dani, to step in and compete for her.

3.SummaryEnglish: It's the day of the big Ride 'N Style competition. Dani is ready to go, but first, the girls need to style Tawny. Dani competes and performs flawlessly. What place will she get?.

1.TitleEnglish: Barbie Sails the Dream Boat to Glitter Island!
1.SummaryEnglish: After the Extras tell Barbie & her sisters about their amazing trip to Imagination Bay, the crew takes the Dreamboat for a vacation!

2.SummaryEnglish: Barbie realizes if believing is seeing, the same is true for what the dolls believe about themselves!

3.SummaryEnglish: Overwhelmed with choices about who to become, Chelsea duplicates herself into a unicorn, a doll, and a monkey! Barbie, Barbie, Skipper, Stacie, and the Cuties remind Chelsea to try new things but remember who she is at heart! However, Chelsea duplicates herself so many times Malibu has to duplicate herself to keep up!

4.SummaryEnglish: Barbie and Chelsea search for Brooklyn, Stacie, and Skipper using their brilliant imaginations and a colorful song!

1.SummaryEnglish: Introducing The Dream Squad: Barbie, Barbie, Stacie, Skipper, & Chelsea! After a magic music box shows a projection of the Extra Mini Minis stuck in slime on their way to a concert, The Dream Squad finds a way to save them!

2.SummaryEnglish: Another adventure for The Dream Squad as they help the Fashionistas set up a surprise birthday party for ... Malibu?!

3.SummaryEnglish: The Dream Squad enter Paint World to figure out who stole their picnic food!

4.TitleEnglish: The Barbie Dream Squad Saves The Animals!
4.SummaryEnglish: The Dream Squad is surprised when the magic music box projects images of animals in need of help! Luckily, they know they can help "little by little" and eventually save they day!

1.SummaryEnglish: School is out for the summer! Barbie, Barbie, Skipper, Stacie, and Chelsea celebrate!

2.TitleEnglish: Barbie and Stacie's Waterpark and Earring Adventures
2.SummaryEnglish: Barbie, Barbie, & friends set out to find some summer thrills!

3.SummaryEnglish: Barbie attempts to create a new summer treat, and Chelsea tries stunts at the skate park!

4.SummaryEnglish: Barbie, Barbie, and friends get a whole new look and have a skateboard chase before saving the Babysitting Expo!
